headline.main: Fierce Gunbattle in Indian Kashmir Kills 3 Combatants
headline.print_headline: Fierce Gunbattle in Indian Kashmir Kills 3 Combatants

lead_paragraph: China pledged more support for its military on Sunday including strengthening maritime and air defenses as it takes steps to safeguard its sovereignty, but in a highly unusual move did not give spending figures for 2017 despite promises of transparency.
